page.title: 13OVER WYRESDALE:NON C.of E.
page.content: Although Christ Church is the only church in the area and the one to which most residents belong, there are members of other denominations here. Most of the Methodists attend services and meetings at Dolphinholme Chapel (50th anniversary-1985) but one family goes to Garstang. In Dolphinholme two services are held every Sunday and the Womens Fellowship meets monthly. A Weekly Fellowship, a Youth Club and a Good News Club are also held there. There are a few Catholics in this area who, while they may worship at Galgate or the University Chapel at Bailrigg, also take part in the parish life of Christ Church. The Lancaster Friends still use the Quaker Burial Ground at Meeting House Farm although the School there was closed about thirty years ago and the buildings sold for private use in 1966.
